attributes.action: Support amendments to the EU Withdrawal Bill on June 12.
attributes.background: Many people are only now becoming aware of the negative impact that Brexit is having upon the United Kingdom. This petition is to enjoin the Leader of the Opposition to act responsibly in the interest of British Citizens and support all amendments to this Bill.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the Leader of the Opposition, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
